tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CourtRulings (
    ruling_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_number VARCHAR(50),
    court_name VARCHAR(100),
    date_of_ruling DATE,
    reproductive_rights BOOLEAN,
    healthcare_access BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE CourtRulings (
    case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(255),
    court_name VARCHAR(255),
    ruling_date DATE,
    topic TEXT,
    decision VARCHAR(50)
);
CREATE TABLE LegalTrends (
    trend_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    start_year INT,
    end_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE court_rulings (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ruling_date DATE,
    issue VARCHAR(100),
    court_name VARCHAR(100),
    plaintiff VARCHAR(100),
    defendant VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE legal_trends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_year INT,
    end_year INT,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_services (
    service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name VARCHAR(100),
    service_type VARCHAR(100),
    provider_name VARCHAR(100),
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE rulings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(255),
    court_name VARCHAR(255),
    ruling_date DATE,
    plaintiff VARCHAR(255),
    defendant VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE laws (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    law_name VARCHAR(255),
    jurisdiction VARCHAR(255),
    enactment_date DATE,
    summary TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE trends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE CourtCases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_name VARCHAR(255),
  court_name VARCHAR(255),
  case_date DATE,
  case_outcome VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Plaintiffs (
  plaintiff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plaintiff_name VARCHAR(255),
  plaintiff_gender VARCHAR(10),
  plaintiff_age INT
)

CREATE TABLE Defendants (
  defendant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  defendant_name VARCHAR(255),
  defendant_gender VARCHAR(10),
  defendant_role VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE LegalTeams (
  team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name VARCHAR(255),
  attorney_1 VARCHAR(255),
  attorney_2 VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE CaseComments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  comment_date DATE,
  commenter_name VARCHAR(255),
  comment_text TEXT
)
